problem.markdown: The SS Pendleton was a 1950's era tanker. On February 18, while en route from New Orleans to Boston, Pendleton broke in two in a gale south of Cape Cod, Massachusetts. The subsequent rescue of the Pendleton's crew from the stormy waters is considered one of the most daring rescues in the history of the United States Coast Guard. >>In what year did the SS Pendleton sink?<< ( ) 1592 {{The 1950's era ship did not sink in 1592.
